title: Ep 2404 - Pinku is Dejected
tags: watch latest episodes of taarak mehta ka ooltah chashmah only on sonyliv
shortDesc: Champaklal feels sad for having shouted at Pinku. The Gokuldham society members too agree with him. Champaklal opines that Pinku will reveal about his parents soon. But, unknown to them, Pinku is planning to leave them forever. Will they stop Pinku?

title: Ep 2405 - Pinku is Going to Canada
tags: watch latest episodes of taarak mehta ka ooltah chashmah only on sonyliv
shortDesc: Kevarchand and Kamla inform Tappu Sena that Pinku is laving India for Canada and shall never return again. Realizing that it is their last chance to stop Pinku, Tappu Sena along with Champaklal decide to go to the airport and stop Pinku.

title: Ep 2406 - Tapu Sena at the Airport
tags: watch latest episodes of taarak mehta ka ooltah chashmah only on sonyliv
shortDesc: Pinku is on his way to Canada and Tapu Sena want to stop him from boarding the flight ar any cost. Incidentally, Tapu Sena meets Lewis, who works at the customs department and seeks his help to stop Pinku. Will Tapu Sena be able to stop Pinku?

title: Ep 2407 - Friends Forever
tags: watch latest episodes of taarak mehta ka ooltah chashmah only on sonyliv
shortDesc: Tappu and Sonu are allowed without a ticket in the boarding area to find and stop Pinku before he boards the flight. The customs officer speaks to Pinku on the walkie-talkie but Pinku does not want to speak with Tappu.

title: Ep 2408 - Pinku Returns
tags: watch latest episodes of taarak mehta ka ooltah chashmah only on sonyliv
shortDesc: Tapu Sena’s joy knows no bounds when Pinku greets them. They are overjoyed that Pinku is not going to Canada and is staying back. When Tapu Sena returns to Gokuldham with Pinku, Champaklal insists that no one should ask Pinku about his parents.

title: Ep 2409 - Champaklal Decides to Adopt Pinku
tags: watch latest episodes of taarak mehta ka ooltah chashmah only on sonyliv
shortDesc: Pinku decides to talk with Champaklal about his parents. He reveals that his parents rarely visit him and he feels abandoned. Champaklal decides to take matter into his own hands and decides to adopt Pinku to teach a lesson to his parents.

title: Ep 2410 - Champaklals Decision
tags: watch latest episodes of taarak mehta ka ooltah chashmah only on sonyliv
shortDesc: Champaklal has decided to adopt Pinku. He calls up Taarak to inquire about the procedure of adoption. Champaklal then informs Jethalal about his decision which leaves him startled. Watch this episode to find out what happens next.

title: Ep 2411 - Champaklals Search for a Lawyer
tags: watch latest episodes of taarak mehta ka ooltah chashmah only on sonyliv
shortDesc: Champaklal is determined to adopt Pinku. Jethalal rushes to Taarak Mehta’s house and informs him to stop Champaklal from doing the adoption.

title: Ep 2412 - Jethalal is Stressed Out
tags: watch latest episodes of taarak mehta ka ooltah chashmah only on sonyliv
shortDesc: Jethalal is under tremendous stress as he cannot fathom the fact that Champaklal is going to adopt Pinku. Jethalal and Taarak try to come up with an idea to solve the crisis. Meanwhile, Champaklal, who is searching for a lawyer, meets Hathi’s friend.

title: Ep 2413 - Jethalals Last Attempt
tags: watch latest episodes of taarak mehta ka ooltah chashmah only on sonyliv
shortDesc: Jethalal is advised by Taarak to cajole Tapu into convincing Champaklal to abandon the idea of adopting Pinku. He meets Tapu and Champaklal and tries to cajole them. Will Champaklal and Tapu fall into Jethalal’s trap? Watch this episode to find out.

title: Ep 2414 - Chalupandey Pays A Visit
shortDesc: The Gokuldham society members are eagerly awaiting the arrival of Pinku’s parents. When a couple arrives at the society, Jethalal is overjoyed. But, it turns out that the couple are not Pinku’s parents.

title: Ep 2415 - The Secret Agents
shortDesc: The Gokuldham society members are in a state of shock after knowing that Pinku’s parents are secret agents. Pinku feels prod of his parents and no longer feels a sense of abandonment.

title: Ep 2416 - Iyers Photograph
shortDesc: Jethalal is eager to play Holi with Babita. Meanwhile, Iyer informs Babita that he has been selected to attend an international conference. But, first he needs a few photographs of himself to submit.

title: Ep 2417 - Holi Celebrations at Gokuldham Society
shortDesc: Jethalal is disappointed that Babita is not playing Holi. He tries his best to convince Babita. Finally, Babita agrees and brings Iyer along. Then, the Gokuldham society member play the festival of colors.

title: Ep 2418 - Sundar Arrives at Gokuldham Society
shortDesc: The Gokuldham society members are excited to celebrate Holi with each other. Jethalal is upset seeing Sundar. He suspects that Sundar has arrived with an intention and takes the help of Goli to dig the truth.
